Translations.Text: illeogalodoe jinliga dolaehayeoss-euni heowiga myeolmaghayeo dasi oji moshalila

illeogalodoe naega banghwanghandamyeongeugeos-eun na seuseuloga banghwagham-iyo naega gil-eul indobad-eumae geugeos-eun ju nim-ui na-e daehan gyesieossgeoneul geubun eun modeun geos-eul deul-eusimyeo gakkai jensinola
geudaeneun geudeul-i jug-eum-ui gongpo leul neukkigo geu ttaeeneun dopeo hal su eobs-eo gakkaun gos-eseo butjabhige doem eul bolila
ittaeseoya geudeul-eun ulineun mid naida lago malhana eotteohge meolli e issneun geudeul-i mid-eum-e ileundaneun mal-inyo
geudeul-eun ijeon-edo geugeos-eul bul sinhayeossgo meolliseo boiji anhneun geos ol uisimhayeossnola

geu ijeon geudeulgwa gat-eun muliuibulsinja-ege geulaessdeon geoscheoleom geudeul gwa geudeul-i balaneun geos saie jangbyeog-i noh-yeojini sillo geudeul-eun bul-anhae hamyeo uisimhaneun jadeul-ieossdeola

hananimkke chanmileul deuliljini geubun-eun mueseo cheonjileul changjohasyeossgocheonsadeul-eul dussang, se ssang, nes-ssang-ui nalgaeleul gajin jeonlyeong-eulo dusyeoss-eumyeo geu bun-ui tteusdaelo changjoleul deohae gasini sillo hananim-eun modeun il-e jeonjijeon neunghasim-ila

hananimkkeseo geubun-ui jabilo inlyuleul wihae bonaesin geu eunhyeleul nu gudo jejaehal su eobs-eumyeo ttohan geubunkkeseo jejihasin geos-eul nugudo jayu lobge hal su eobsnani geubun-eun gwonneung-gwajihyelo chungmanhasim-ila

salamdeul-iyeo neohuiege bepul-eo jun junim-ui eunhyeleul saeng-gaghaljini ha nanim oee haneulgwa daejilobuteo neo huiege yangsig-eul juneun daleun changjoju ga issneunyo geubun oeeneun sin-i eobsnani eojjihayeo neohuineun geubun-ui yuil seong-eul moleuneunyo
